title: Pregnant Person
description:
A pregnant person holding their round stomach. Sometimes used in jest to represent feeling too full after overeating, as in a "food baby."

Variants include ðŸ«„ Pregnant Woman and ðŸ«ƒ Pregnant Man.

This emoji was approved to make the emoji keyboard more consistent and gender inclusive.
apple_vendor_description: The pregnant person emoji on Apple devices is depicted with graceful curves and a subtly rounded belly, rendered in Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges that convey a sense of gentle anticipation. Realistic lighting accentuates the form, giving it a warm and comforting presence. This emoji, with its serene expression, symbolizes new beginnings, family growth, and the profound journey of pregnancy, offering a sensitive and respectful representation in digital conversations.
